resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107034</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107034</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207210</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Battle of Stones River: The Soldiers' Story</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Schlacht von Stein-Fluß: Die Geschichte
Der Soldaten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La bataille du fleuve de pierres : 
l'Histoire des Soldats</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A batalha do rio das pedras: A História Dos
Soldados</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La battaglia del fiume delle pietre: La 
Storia Dei Soldati</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η μάχη του ποταμού πετρών: Η ιστορία των 
στρατιωτών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La batalla del río de las piedras: La 
Historia De los Soldados</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">provides readings, maps, and visual representations of this battle near Murfreesboro, Tennessee, which was the second bloodiest battle fought west of the Appalachians during the Civil War.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt Messwerte, Karten und Sichtdarstellungen 
dieser Schlacht nahe Murfreesboro, Tennessee zur Verfügung, das die 
zweite blutigste Schlacht war, die westlich von den Appalachians 
während des Bürgerkrieges gekämpft wurde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fournit des lectures, des cartes, et des 
représentations visuelles de cette bataille près de Murfreesboro, 
Tennessee, qui était la deuxième bataille la plus sanglante 
combattue à l'ouest des Appalaches pendant la guerre civile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fornece leituras, mapas, e respresentações 
visuais desta batalha perto de Murfreesboro, Tennessee, que era a 
segunda batalha a mais sangrenta lutada ao oeste dos appalachians 
durante a guerra civil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fornisce le letture, i programmi e le 
rappresentazioni visive di questa battaglia vicino a Murfreesboro, 
Tennessee, che era la seconda battaglia più sanguinante combattuta ad
ovest dei appalachians durante la guerra civile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρέχει τις αναγνώσεις, τους χάρτες, και τις οπτικές 
αντιπροσωπεύσεις αυτής της μάχης κοντά σε Murfreesboro, 
Tennessee, το οποίο ήταν η δεύτερη πιό αιματηρή μάχη που 
πάλεψαν δυτικά του Appalachians κατά τη διάρκεια του εμφύλιου 
πολέμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">proporciona a lecturas, a correspondencias, y a 
las representaciones visuales de esta batalla cerca de Murfreesboro, 
Tennessee, que era la segunda batalla más sangrienta de combate al 
oeste de los apalaches durante la guerra civil.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770207210</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107034</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-battle-of-stones-river-the-soldiers-story</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
